Enumeration Clocks

An enum of all clocks that can be used by ReplicatedRegister.

Index

Enumeration Members

  • DEFAULT
  • REVERSE
  • CUSTOM
  • CUSTOM_AUTO_INCREMENT

Enumeration Members

DEFAULT

DEFAULT: 0
  • Defined in src/replicated-data/index.ts:74

The default clock, uses the machines system time.

REVERSE

REVERSE: 1
  • Defined in src/replicated-data/index.ts:79

A reverse clock, for achieving first - write - wins semantics.

CUSTOM

CUSTOM: 2
  • Defined in src/replicated-data/index.ts:84

A custom clock.

CUSTOM_AUTO_INCREMENT

CUSTOM_AUTO_INCREMENT: 3
  • Defined in src/replicated-data/index.ts:89

A custom clock that automatically increments if the current clock value is less than the existing clock value.
